id: MashableGet an electric toothbrush on sale for less than $50 and keep that smile bright
paragraph:
Smile! Or don't. We're not going to tell you how to live your life. If you're looking for an electric toothbrush, though, we'll be happy to let you in on a little secret: the Platinum Sonic Toothbrush cleans just as effectively as those fancy brand-name brushes, but for a fraction of the price.SEE ALSO: Improve your vocabulary for less than $20With 40,000 brushstrokes per minute, the Platinum Sonic features 30-second area change alerts and a two-minute smart auto timer that'll give you a thorough cleaning for the dentist-recommended time, during which you can rotate between three different modes: clean, dazzle, and pulse. And because the average human's mouth is a veritable cesspool of germs, the Platinum Sonic comes with a UV sanitizing charging base that cleans the bristles while it charges.For a limited time, the Platinum Sonic Toothbrush's gold, silver, and charcoal styles are on sale in the Mashable Shop for just $49.99 — a massive savings of 80% off its original price of $259.
